message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire an item that is worth more than $10,000 to you, while also providing me with a satisfactory return for my investment.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to go up to $10,500 at this time. This price still allows you to profit from the sale and is within my budget.  Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. However, after careful consideration, I am unable to accept $10,500 for the product. My minimum acceptable price remains at $11,500. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
